title: Joie - Joy, Allegra, Furaha & Ayo
description:
Joie - Joy, Allegra, Furaha & Ayo Joie de Vivre; (French: keen or buoyant enjoyment of life.) 3rd (work) Places you already love Redefining Workspaces, One Unforgettable Experience at a Time.”#UnreasonableWorkplaces

As people, we don't want to work anywhere boring. 
You want experiences - not WeWork or shared desks, that is no longer the standard.
We set a different standard; Curated Experiences. 
Museums, Art Galleries, Flower shops etc.; any underutilized third place with story and community
